statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{3 \, x^{3} + x^{2} + 2 \, x - 6 , -24 \, x^{3} - 12 \, x^{2} - 8 \, x + 48 , -6 \, x^{3} - 8 \, x + 12 , 12 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} + 12 \, x - 24 , 3 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x - 6\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
